snippet.title: GRAVIATORS - RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Embark on a thrilling cosmic adventure as GRAVIATORS releases its gravity-breaking action on Steam today, August 31st, 2023!

🛍️ Get it on Steam: Experience the excitement by getting GRAVIATORS on Steam now: Steam Store https://store.steampowered.com/app/1958540/GRAVIATORS/

🌌 Couch in the Woods studio is excited to announce the official launch of their highly competitive, arcade-style game, GRAVIATORS.

🎮 Casual-Friendly eSports: Immerse yourself in the world of casual-friendly eSports with GRAVIATORS, where intense battles unfold in pinball-like arenas amidst the stars.

🕒 Gameplay Stream Recap: In case you missed it, we had an electrifying gameplay stream on August 3rd at 7:00 PM CEST. Explore the gameplay mechanics, witness epic battles, discover the online highscore system, and uncover more exciting details! If you couldn't catch the stream, no worries – we've got you covered! Stay tuned for further updates and announcements. 🚀

Stream Recap: Relive the excitement here - Gameplay Stream Recap https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fMsnHey-ZEg

🪐 Team Arena Space Sports: Engage in thrilling battles within mesmerizing pinball-inspired arenas, utilizing unique gravity and shield abilities in your spacepod. Gain points by controlling and shooting the ball into your opponents' goal.

🏆 Variety of Game Modes: GRAVIATORS offers an array of exhilarating game modes:

Versus Arena: Secure fleeting points by breaking down your opponents' shields. Score by shooting into the black hole and ascend the leaderboard!

Planetary Arena: Strategize with goals flanking the screen and a central black hole. Utilize it for power and tactics. Annihilate shields, score goals, and amass points!

Meteor Shower: Safeguard your planet against waves of asteroids. Swiftly destroy them for higher multipliers. Prepare for evolving challenges with new asteroids and threats.

🌲 About Couch in the Woods:
Established in the Black Forest, Germany, Couch in the Woods is a dedicated indie game development studio. Their amalgamation of gaming and nature has given birth to GRAVIATORS, a journey from student room concepts to a fully-fledged title. With the support of Bonus Stage Publishing, they're prepared to conquer the gaming universe.

🔗 Learn more about Couch in the Woods: Couch in the Woods https://couchinthewoods.de/

Unleash the gravitational force within you and become a part of the ultimate space showdown. The stars are ready for your conquest in GRAVIATORS! 🌠 #GRAVIATORS #SpaceArenaSports #OutNow #UnleashGravity
